name: Sky Runner (itch) (its_HarshArora, codedvk)
description:
Sky Runner is a 3D FPS high speed parkour-esque race to the finish line experience.

Controls:

  • Movement: W,A,S,D
  • Jump: Space
  • Aim: Mouse
  • Shoot: Mouse - Left Click

Skill Moves:

  • Intermediate:
    • Wall Run: Space + Wall
    • Wall Jump: Space + Wall
  • Advanced:
    • Jump Shoot: Space + Aim (Look Down) + Shoot

Creators: Harshit Arora and Dhruv Kapoor

This prototype was made within 48 hours.
Hope you enjoy it!
